alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 9:39PM CDT until June 02 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. .River levels are slowly falling and this trend is expected to continue over the next few days. Chances for showers and thunderstorms through Tuesday will likely only cause localized impacts. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, water reaches flood mitigation culverts on Riverside Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Saturday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 20.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.9 feet on 04/04/2007. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
